original_text: More than that, the Father does not judge anyone. He has given authority to the Son, so that the Son will judge all people.
korean_text: 아버지께서 아무도 심판하지 아니하시고 심판을 다 아들에게 맡기셨으니

sentences.original_text: the Father does not judge anyone
He has given authority to the Son
so that the Son will judge all people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 아들이 모든 사람을 심판하게 하시려는 것이다
